statements: DELETE FROM community_consultations WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM community_consultations WHERE theme = 'Environmental Protection' AND participant_name LIKE '%Alice%' AND participant_contact = 'alice@example.com';
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE rating < 3 AND submitted_at < '2021-06-30';
DELETE FROM ethical_concerns WHERE consultation_id = 5 AND resolved = false;
DELETE FROM participants WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE feedback_text = 'Negative feedback about the location';
DELETE FROM participants WHERE organization = 'XYZ Corp';
